description: Calculates the overall temperature stability of a container based on deviations and critical events.
definition: TSS = (1 - \frac{TempDevCount}{100}) \times (1 - \frac{CritEvents}{10}) \times TempStabIdx

description: Measures how quickly the coolant is being depleted.
definition: CDR = \frac{100 - CoolRemainPct}{(Current_Date - RefillLatest)}

description: Calculates overall risk level for a container based on temperature stability and coolant status.
definition: CRI = (1 - TSS) \times (1 - \frac{CoolRemainPct}{100})

description: Calculates remaining viable days for vaccines considering temperature deviations.
definition: VVP = (ExpireDay - Current_Date) \times TSS

description: Calculates the percentage of route completed.
definition: RCP = \frac{DistDoneKm}{DistDoneKm + DistLeftKm} \times 100

description: Measures how efficiently container volume is utilized.
definition: SER = \frac{VialTally \times 10}{VolLiters}

description: Overall health score for data logger.
definition: LHI = \frac{BatteryPct}{100} \times (1 - \frac{MemUsePct}{100}) \times \frac{DataPct}{100}

description: Calculates compliance with maintenance schedules.
definition: MCS = CompScore \times (1 - \frac{Incidents}{10})

description: Measures quality of shipment handling.
definition: HQI = (1 - \frac{HandleEvents}{100}) \times (1 - \frac{CritEvents}{10})

description: Calculates severity of temperature breaches.
definition: TBS = \frac{|TempNowC - StoreTempC|}{TempTolC} \times TempDevCount

description: Classifies containers based on overall risk and temperature stability to prioritize immediate action and monitor operational trends.
definition:
Four-level classification based on CRI, TSS, and TBS:
- Critical: CRI > 0.6 OR current TSS < 0.4
- Unstable: Average TSS < 0.4 OR maximum TBS > 1.5 over the past 1 year, and not Critical
- Moderate: Average TSS >= 0.4 AND maximum TBS <= 1.5 over the past 1 year, and not Critical
- Stable: Average TSS >= 0.7 AND maximum TBS <= 1.0 over the past 1 year, and not Critical

description: Identifies shipments with serious integrity issues.
definition: A shipment with IntegrityMark='Compromised' or SealFlag='Broken' or TamperSign='Confirmed'

description: Identifies high-risk transportation routes.
definition: A route where RCP < 50% and CRI > 0.4

description: Identifies equipment requiring maintenance.
definition: Equipment where MCS < 0.7 and (Current_Date > MaintDateNext or Current_Date > CalibDateNext)

description: Identifies stable transport conditions.
definition: Transport where HQI > 0.9 and TSS > 0.8

description: Identifies loggers at risk of failure.
definition: A logger where LHI < 0.3 or (BatteryPct < 20 and PwrBackupFlag='Not Available')

description: Identifies critical temperature conditions.
definition: A condition where TBS > 2.0 and TempDevCount > 5

description: Identifies critical coolant conditions.
definition: A condition where CDR > 1 and CoolRemainPct < 30

description: Identifies efficiently utilized containers.
definition: A container where SER > 0.8 and TSS > 0.9

description: Identifies quality-compromised shipments.
definition: A shipment where VVP < 30 or QualCheck='Failed'

description: Illustrates safe temperature range
definition: Temperature between 2°C and 8°C indicates optimal vaccine storage conditions.

description: Illustrates excellent compliance level
definition: A score above 0.9 indicates excellent compliance with all regulatory requirements.

description: Illustrates RF communication protocol
definition: Uses 433MHz ISM band radio frequency transmission with FSK modulation for short-range data exchange below 100m.

description: Illustrates immediate data transmission
definition: Indicates data is being transmitted to the central system without delay as it is collected.

description: Illustrates PCM cooling mechanism
definition: Uses paraffin-based material with 2-8°C phase transition point and 200 kJ/kg latent heat capacity for temperature stabilization.

description: Illustrates specialized container type
definition: Self-powered refrigeration unit maintaining -20°C to +30°C with R-134a refrigerant and independent power supply lasting 72 hours.

description: Illustrates satellite communication mode
definition: Indicates the system is using satellite networks for global coverage and reliable data transmission.

description: Illustrates vaccine technology type
definition: Uses modified adenovirus Ad26 vector expressing SARS-CoV-2 spike protein, requiring -20°C storage with 6-month shelf life.

description: Illustrates active location tracking
definition: Indicates that GPS tracking is operational and accurately reporting location data.

description: Illustrates light exposure meaning.
definition: Measured in lux. 0-10: Dark (ideal), 10-50: Low light, >50: Excessive exposure risk.

description: Combines container risk and handling quality for overall risk assessment.
definition: TRS = \text{CRI} \times (1 - \text{HQI}) \times (1 + \text{TBS})

description: Measures how efficiently coolant is maintaining temperature stability.
definition: CEI = \text{TSS} \times \frac{\text{CoolRemainPct}}{100} \times (1 - \frac{\text{CDR}}{20})

description: Evaluates overall maintenance risk considering compliance and incidents.
definition: CMR = (1 - \text{MCS}) \times (1 + \frac{\text{TBS}}{5}) \times (1 - \text{LHI})

description: Overall quality score for shipment considering multiple factors.
definition: SQI = \frac{\text{VVP}}{365} \times \text{HQI} \times (1 - \text{CRI})

description: Comprehensive score for logger reliability.
definition: LRS = 	ext{LHI} \times (1 - \text{CMR}) \times \text{TSS}

description: Safety rating for transport considering multiple factors.
definition: TSR = \frac{\text{RCP}}{100} \times (1 - \text{TRS}) \times \text{HQI}

description: Overall container efficiency considering multiple metrics.
definition: CES = \text{SER} \times \text{CEI} \times (1 - \text{CRI})

description: Combined quality and maintenance metric.
definition: QMI = \text{MCS} \times \text{SQI} \times (1 - \frac{\text{TBS}}{10})

description: Comprehensive route risk assessment.
definition: RRF = (1 - \frac{	ext{RCP}}{100}) \times \text{TRS} \times (1 - \text{CEI})

description: Overall safety index for vaccine shipment.
definition: VSI = \frac{	ext{VVP}}{365} \times \text{CEI} \times (1 - \text{TRS})

description: Identifies critically unsafe transport conditions.
definition: A transport condition where TSR < 0.4 and TRS > 0.6

description: Identifies containers with severe combined risks.
definition: A container where CES < 0.3 and CEI < 0.5

description: Identifies equipment requiring urgent maintenance.
definition: Equipment where CMR > 0.7 and QMI < 0.4

description: Identifies routes with critical risk levels.
definition: A route where RRF > 0.8 and TSR < 0.3

description: Identifies potentially compromised vaccines.
definition: A condition where VSI < 0.4 and CES < 0.5

description: Identifies critically failing loggers.
definition: A logger where LRS < 0.3 and CMR > 0.8

description: Identifies severe quality issues.
definition: A status where QMI < 0.3 and VSI < 0.5

description: Identifies unsafe transport conditions.
definition: A condition where TSR < 0.5 and RRF > 0.7

description: Identifies containers requiring urgent attention.
definition: A status where CES < 0.4 and TRS > 0.7

description: Identifies critically unsafe overall conditions.
definition: A condition where VSI < 0.3 and TSR < 0.4

description: Advanced temperature stability metric incorporating thermal mass and ambient conditions.
definition: TSC = \text{TSS} \cdot e^{-\frac{|\text{TempNowC} - \text{StoreTempC}|}{5}} \cdot \left(1 - \alpha \cdot \frac{\text{TempNowC} - \text{TempPrevC}}{\text{ReadingInterval}}\right)

description: Comprehensive risk evaluation using multiple environmental parameters.
definition: MPRA = \sqrt{\text{CRI}^2 + \text{TBS}^2 + (1-\text{HQI})^2} \times (1 + \frac{\text{CDR}}{\text{CDR}_{\text{max}}})

description: Calculates quality deterioration rate considering time and environmental factors.
definition: TWQD = -\frac{d}{dt}(\text{VVP}) \times (1 + \beta\text{TBS}) \times (1 + \gamma(\text{1-TSS}))

description: Quantifies combined environmental stressors on vaccine stability.
definition: ESF = \text{TSS} \cdot (1 + \frac{\text{TBS}}{5}) \cdot \text{CEI} \cdot (1 + \frac{|\text{TempNowC} - \text{StoreTempC}|}{\text{TempTolC}})

description: Evaluates overall logistics efficiency with temporal considerations.
definition: LPM = \text{RCP} \cdot \frac{\text{HQI}}{\sqrt{1 + \text{TRS}}}

description: Identifies systemic failure patterns in the cold chain.
definition: A condition where (MPRA > 0.8 AND TSC < 0.4) OR (TWQD > 0.6 AND ESF > 0.7)

description: Identifies complex quality degradation scenarios.
definition: A status where VSI decreases over three consecutive readings AND LPM < 0.5 AND ESF > 0.6

description: Evaluates stability under varying conditions.
definition: A condition where average TSC over last 5 readings < 0.7 AND MPRA > 0.6

description: Identifies concurrent failures across multiple subsystems.
definition: A state where (CRI + TBS + (1-HQI))/3 > 0.7 AND all of (TSC, LPM, ESF) < 0.3

description: Forecasts potential quality degradation based on current trends.
definition: Alert when TWQD increases over 3 consecutive readings AND ESF > 0.5 AND TempDevCount > 3

description: Time denominator used for calculating rate of temperature change
definition: Time interval in minutes between successive temperature readings, used to normalize temperature differences into rates of change. Standard value is 15 minutes with acceptable range 5-60 minutes depending on monitoring requirements

description: Calculates the number of days past the scheduled maintenance or calibration date.
definition: DaysOverdue = \max\left( (\text{Current_Date} - \text{MaintDateNext}), (\text{Current_Date} - \text{CalibDateNext}), 0 \right)

description: Ranks containers based on the rate of coolant depletion.
definition: Rank assigned to containers based on descending order of CDR

description: Ranks containers based on their storage efficiency.
definition: Rank assigned to containers based on descending order of SER

description: Ranks containers based on their risk level.
definition: Rank assigned to containers based on descending order of CRI

description: Ranks vehicles based on maintenance risk and overdue days.
definition: \text{Rank assigned to vehicles based on descending order of } \text{CMR} + \text{DaysOverdue} / 30
